alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:33PM CDT until March 24 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown affecting Pike and Walthall Counties. For the Bogue Chitto River...including Tylertown, Franklinton, Bush...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Low-lying farm and pasture land near the river will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 PM CDT Wednesday was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 02/05/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
